Definition.WordDefinition: unlikable adj 1: (of characters in literature or drama) tending to evoke antipathetic feelings; "all the characters were peculiarly unsympathetic" [syn: {unsympathetic}, {unappealing}, {unlikeable}] [ant: {sympathetic}] 2: difficult or impossible to like; "a disagreeable and unlikable old woman" [syn: {unlikeable}]
